entry.title: *pre-order* BOY TEE IN ROSE JERSEY
entry.summary:
Vendor: RAQUEL ALLEGRA
Type: TOP
Price: 200.00

Classic jersey boy tee in a hand dyed rose jersey.

A riff on wearing proportions that would be suitable for a smaller straighter body type. Slimmer through the bust and kicks out at the shoulder. It encourages a straighter more boyish look in the body. It’s casual, and comfortable. A staple with any bottom or under any layer.

Material: 100% Cotton / Hand Wash

Marike is 5'10" and wears a size 0

Made in LA

entry.title: ONE-OF-A-KIND NIGHTFALL KIMONO KANTHA JACKET - SIZE SMALL
entry.summary:
Vendor: ALIX OF BOHEMIA
Type: JACKET
Price: 2169.00

This One of A Kind quilted kimono jacket, crafted from an antique Indian Kantha quilt, with hundreds of hand stitches creating its unique texture. Open front, v-neck, with front patch pockets. 

Patches and imperfections that may occur in this textile are characteristic of the Kantha's history, and are part of the beauty of hand making process, bearing witness to the artisans hand. 

  • One of a Kind
  • 100% Hand Quilted Cotton
  • Crafted From A Vintage Kantha Quilt
  • Machine Wash Cool, Line Dry
  • Made in Jaipur, India

entry.title: INDIGO PRINT SHIRT
entry.summary:
Vendor: ALIX OF BOHEMIA
Type: TOP
Price: 495.00

Inspired by a Victorian blouse, this piece has been hand printed in indigo flower motif, with button front and pleating details throughout. 

This textile has been printed by hand, in small workshops using ancient methods. Subtle printing and dye variations will occur in this fabric. These are part of the natural beauty and character of the hand printing process, and the signature of the artisan’s hand.

  • Details: Button front, slightly cropped in the body, boxy shape
  • Material: 100% Cotton.
  • Item fits true to size, model wears a size S
  • Machine Wash Cold And Gentle, Line Dry
  • Block Printed By Hand
  • Made in Jaipur, India
